definitions.definition: Any of the relatively small crocodilians of the genus Caiman , within the family Alligatoridae .
A crocodilian of the subfamily Caimaninae , which includes the very large black caiman .
A semi-aquatic lizard , of the genus Dracaena , found in South America . To differentiate from caimans, they are referred to as caiman lizards .

main_definition: ( strictly ) Any of the relatively small crocodilians of the genus Caiman , within the family Alligatoridae .
secondary_definitions: ( loosely ) A crocodilian of the subfamily Caimaninae , which includes the very large black caiman .
A semi-aquatic lizard , of the genus Dracaena , found in South America . To differentiate from caimans, they are referred to as caiman lizards .
